Module org.orderManagement
Package org.orderManagement.businessLayer

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
org.orderManagement.businessLayer.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
A class that handles the user interaction with the user interface The class handles actions that should occur when a specific button is pressed
